intro: Ilex debaoensis, commonly known as the Debao holly, is a species of evergreen shrub or small tree native to China. It belongs to the family Aquifoliaceae and is characterized by its dense, spiny leaves and small, dark berries. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions with a humid climate, thriving in well-drained soils. Its foliage remains green throughout the year, making it an ornamental plant in horticulture. Ilex debaoensis is also valued for its ecological role in supporting local wildlife.
